props.header: Our namesake, Roberto C. Goizueta once said, “Business schools today cannot just reflect business the way it is. They must teach business the way it will be.”
props.text: Named for one of the great business leaders of the 20th century, Goizueta Business School is a training ground for principled leaders and a laboratory for powerful insights. By navigating the complex interdependency of business and society, we seek to convene brilliant minds to solve profound problems with integrity, ingenuity, and grit.
We are in the business of unlocking the potential of others.
props.attribution: — Jagdish N. Sheth, Charles H. Kellstadt Chaired Professor of Marketing

props.title: Extending Access through Scholarships
props.body:
At Goizueta, students come first. That’s why one of our chief campaign priorities is scholarship support. The cost of pursuing an undergraduate, graduate, or PhD degree is a significant investment; one that can be a prohibitive obstacle for many. At their core, scholarships provide individual students financial relief and allow Goizueta to attract the most sought-after student talent. More broadly, they benefit communities by establishing a pipeline of diverse and talented students prepared to join (or rejoin) the workforce.

Your support of scholarships helps us attract and retain top students to Goizueta's degree programs; and to improve the diversity and talent of our student body. Our goal is to create equal access and opportunity for all students with the talent and abilities to drive business forward, regardless of their ability to pay. Tomorrow’s leaders and better businesses start with access and opportunity today.
props.media_text: Your support of 2O36 helps us attract and retain top students to all of the school’s degree programs, and to improve the diversity and talent of our student body.

props.title: Business and Society are One
props.body:
Goizueta Business School is reimagining business to solve society’s biggest problems – critical issues confronting people, the planet, and the business community. Its community-facing initiatives address long-standing inequities while empowering communities locally, regionally, and globally. Its research creates platforms for dialog, debate, and collaborative problem solving. Over the last decade, the school has accelerated more than 300 small businesses in underserved communities in Atlanta and Central America, published more than 30 research papers focused on business and society, enrolled 200+ students annually in social advancement courses. Goizueta challenges both its students and the world to further explore the connection between business and positive social impact.

Funding through 2O36 will allow Goizueta to help markets work for more people in more places. It will provide for a wide range of student and community initiatives, including microbusiness development (Start:ME Accelerator), specialty coffee markets (Grounds for Empowerment and Transparent Trade Coffee), next-generation leaders (Social Enterprise Fellows), and faculty-led interdisciplinary research. This support can expand work to find solutions that transcend borders and politics and achieve thriving markets, vibrant communities, and a healthy planet for all.

props.title: Data is Key to Understanding
props.body:
As businesses and organizations increasingly rely on data to drive decisions, we must invest in world-class programs that analyze, harness, and wield data to drive business forward. Goizueta prepares students to succeed in a data-driven world by teaching them to be fluent in the languages of business, data, and technology. Data is the key to solving some of the world's most complex challenges. And when you put that insight into the hands of a Goizueta business leader, you unlock the wisdom to transform industries.

Your generosity to 2O36 allows us to meet the growing demand for data-savvy business professionals, attract talented students by expanding experiential learning programming, and provide analytics insights to our corporate partners. Through an immersive academic experience with an emphasis on hands-on learning in real-world partnerships, Goizueta’s data-driven graduates bring well-informed, innovative solutions to the table in any function, organization, or field.

items.title: Entrepreneurship is the Evolution of Business
items.description:
By fostering discovery, entrepreneurship, and early-stage investing, we help leaders solve today’s challenges and create tomorrow’s opportunities. By enabling students, business owners, and investors to build partnerships that both foster economic growth and inspire continuous innovation, Goizueta Business School empowers them to develop and implement solutions to business problems, unaddressed market opportunities, and significant social needs.

Goizueta’s multidisciplinary approach supports and nurtures original thinking through a multi-faceted and robust mix of coursework, mentorships, student startups, launch accelerators, pitch competitions, summits, conferences, and more as students formulate ideas and engage Atlanta’s vibrant, rapidly growing entrepreneurial ecosystem. Funding through 2O36 sustains current offerings and expands the scope of entrepreneurial programming to better support the needs of our academic and business communities all in service to unleashing creativity, collaboration, and transformative problem solving.

items.title: Leadership is More than a Mindset
items.description:
Built on academic, experiential, and reflective learning, Goizueta Business School shapes next generation leaders who reflect Roberto C. Goizueta’s principle of conducting business with integrity. These leadership skills are infused into every aspect of the curriculum and immersive experiential learning opportunities like the Undergraduate Business Student Leadership Conference, Delta Leadership Coaching Fellows Program, Leader’s Reaction Course, Goizueta Advanced Leadership Academy, and Crisis Leadership VR Simulations. Students in these programs build the knowledge, skills, and self-awareness they need to work across boundaries, act with integrity, create vision, and inspire others.

Support for our leadership programming through 2O36 will allow us to scale our programs to further develop business leaders well-equipped to advance business for shareholders and stakeholders alike.

items.title: Invest in Brilliant Minds
items.description:
Goizueta faculty come from all over the world to change the world of business. When we invest in distinguished professorships, we invest in the students of Goizueta. When we fund thought-provoking research, we deliver relevant industry insights and drive innovation. In classroom lessons, in industry research, and in life, our faculty members constantly seek to go above and beyond to inspire purpose, educate minds, and revolutionize thinking.

Supporting faculty research through 2O36 funds academic inquiry and scholarship, designating resources that enable rigorous research. Supporting endowed professorships enables Goizueta to attract and retain the highest-quality faculty members and enhances every aspect of the student experience. This kind of academic funding and engagement makes the business school a more sought-after institution, improving faculty retention and recruitment efforts, generating new academic pedagogy, redesigning curricula based on research results, and elevating Goizueta faculty as thought leaders in business.

items.title: Education at the Speed of Business
items.description:
The student experience is central to Goizueta’s mission of developing principled leaders, and the Business Fund for Excellence provides the financial resources necessary to maintain our top priorities and respond quickly to changing market demands. From operational support for degree programs (supplementing academic advising and career resources) to co-curricular experiences (think business analytics training or enhanced diversity programming) and curricular innovation (integrating VR, AR, and AI into classroom lessons) to environment shifts (such as remote course delivery due to a global pandemic), these opportunities require resources to enable students to flourish.

Supporting the Business Fund for Excellence provides Goizueta with the ability to respond in real time to the changing needs of our students, our community, and the business industry. It helps us advance business education and therefore, business leaders.
